metadata.Plot: A revolver-wielding stranger crosses paths with two warring clans who are both on the hunt for a hidden treasure in a remote western town. Knowing his services are valuable to either side, he offers himself to the clan who will offer up the largest share of the wealth.
metadata.Actors: Hideaki It√¥, K√¥ichi Sat√¥, Quentin Tarantino
